summary: A comprehensive unit‑test suite for Ansible’s vault parsing module, exercising file‑based secret handling, secret retrieval functions, secret matching logic, vault text parsing, user prompting utilities, script client detection, subprocess‑based script secret reading, hex‑to‑bytes conversion, AES‑256 cipher behavior, and encrypted‑data detection for both binary and text inputs.
business_intent: Automatically verify the correctness, security and compatibility of all vault‑related features in Ansible, preventing regressions in secret management, encryption/decryption, parsing and user interaction, thereby safeguarding sensitive data and ensuring reliable automation.
